changeSet.createView: SELECT a.ID,a.FROZEN_BOX_CODE,a.EQUIPMENT_CODE,a.AREA_CODE,a.SUPPORT_RACK_CODE,a.COLUMNS_IN_SHELF,a.ROWS_IN_SHELF, (a.EQUIPMENT_CODE||'.'||a.AREA_CODE||'.'||a.SUPPORT_RACK_CODE ||'.'||a.COLUMNS_IN_SHELF || lpad(a.ROWS_IN_SHELF,2,0)) as position, s.SAMPLE_TYPE_CODE,sc.SAMPLE_CLASSIFICATION_CODE, s.SAMPLE_TYPE_NAME,sc.SAMPLE_CLASSIFICATION_NAME ,f.IS_SPLIT , a.STATUS,a.COUNT_OF_SAMPLE,a.STOCK_IN_CODE,t.TRANSHIP_CODE FROM STOCK_IN_BOX a LEFT JOIN FROZEN_BOX f on a.FROZEN_BOX_ID=f.ID LEFT JOIN SAMPLE_TYPE s on f.SAMPLE_TYPE_ID=s.ID LEFT JOIN SAMPLE_CLASSIFICATION sc on f.SAMPLE_CLASSIFICATION_ID=sc.ID LEFT JOIN TRANSHIP_BOX tb on tb.FROZEN_BOX_ID = f.ID LEFT JOIN TRANSHIP t on t.ID = tb.TRANSHIP_ID
